# Evidence Checklist

## Purpose
This checklist helps you evaluate the quality of evidence used in your writing. You must score at least 80% on this assessment before proceeding to the next unit.

## Instructions
Review each piece of evidence in your writing against these criteria:

### Relevance
- [ ] Evidence directly supports your main argument
- [ ] Information is on-topic and necessary

### Credibility
- [ ] Sources are authoritative and trustworthy
- [ ] Information is current and accurate
- [ ] Multiple sources confirm key points

### Citation
- [ ] All sources properly cited in required format
- [ ] Quotations clearly indicated
- [ ] Paraphrased content properly attributed

## Scoring
Each criterion is worth equal points. You must achieve at least 80% to unlock the next unit.
